msContents.summary: Loan of ten and a third solidi of gold to be repaid in wine

msItem.note: Written along the fibers; on the back 1 line along the fibers
23 lines of writing on the front and 1 line on the back in a medium-size hand

supportDesc.support: 1papyrus fragment, broken on top and bottom ; 7.1 x 17.4 cm

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from M. Nahman through H.I. Bell, November 1925; no. 60 (V.A.43) in Bell

keywords.term: Loan to be repaid in kind

div.ab: - - - I acknowledge that I have received from you now immediately ten and a third solidi of gold by your private weight standard, total, 10 1/3 sol. of gold by private weight standard, and I acknowledge that I will repay these to you in your house as follows: seven solidi before the vintage at the rate of a hundred five-sextarius sekomata per one solidus, the other three and a third at the then known price at the vintage of Mesore of the present ninth indiction, from wine of the pressing of the tenth indiction without delay, with you furnishing the empty containers and me being responsible for the quality of wine until the end of Tybi; I will pay also on behalf of the expense of the harvest...
